'''Tomas Alaeus''' is a former member of [[Mojang Studios]].<ref name=jebtweet>{{tweet|jeb_|578943001730355201}}</ref> He was a developer for {{el|be}}<ref>{{tweet|_tomcc|578943956408471553}}</ref><ref>{{tweet|shoghicp|578943330794471425}}</ref> and mostly developed the Bedrock Edition's [[Realms]].<ref name=jebtweet />

Tomas Alaeus studied Computer engineering at Royal Institute of Technology in Stockholm, Sweden from 2005 to 2010. After that, he worked as a game developer at the company Fabrication Games in Stockholm for about one year. In March 2012, he changed to the Swedish offshoot of the British game company [[King]]. There he worked as game developer, especially on the mobile version of the game ''[[w:Candy Crush Saga|Candy Crush Saga]]'', for three years until he came to Mojang in early March 2015.<ref name=linkedin/> 

He left Mojang in 2020.<ref>https://se.linkedin.com/in/tomas-alaeus-b222544b</ref>
